title: anbirundhalE pOdhum
sahitya:
anbirundAlE pOdum AndavanE inda akhila uyirgaLaiyum pUNDavanE

shivanE un



anupallavi



minnoli venna shollum punbhuvi mOhaminri enporul enavonrum

illaiyena sheidE unparam enrE vAzhum inba svEccai tarum



caraNam



manamalar koNDEyanudinam unnai arcittu mAshaTra paNivinAl malaraDi vandittu

anaittumum cittamenrE arindu pira marandE Atma samarppaNattAl aLLi unnai aNaiyum
